cyclone.name: HENRI
cyclone.current_location: about 135 mi SSE of Montauk Point, New York
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then turning north-northwest toward southern New England / eastern Long Island, then slowing over interior New England
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern New England or eastern Long Island, NY

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch from East Rockaway Inlet to Mastic NY, north of Chatham MA to Sagamore Beach MA, and Cape Cod Bay
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Mastic Beach NY to Montauk Point NY, Montauk Point to Flushing NY, Flushing NY to Chatham MA, Nantucket/Martha's Vineyard/Block Island; Hurricane Warning Fire Island Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY, Port Jefferson Harbor NY to Montauk Point NY, New Haven CT to west of Westport MA, Block Island; Tropical Storm Warning Port Jefferson Harbor NY west to Manasquan Inlet NJ (including NYC) and Westport MA to Chatham MA including islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Long Island, southern and coastal New England, New Jersey coastline, portions of New York Bight
weather_observation.wind: Gusty easterly winds 20–30 mph possible Sunday, low chance (≤5%) of sustained tropical-storm force
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1 ft or less possible inside Delaware Bay; main surge threat remains farther north along NJ/NY shores
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain Sunday into early Monday could produce localized ponding on terminal surfaces
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along Delaware and New Jersey beaches; brief marine traffic disruptions possible in Delaware Bay
